sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="u_project_effort"> <u_project_effort action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <sys_created_by>Amal.Madhav</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2025-04-04 15:22:07</sys_created_on> <sys_id>6d10ae8cc3306a1052237405e40131e6</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>Athul</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2025-05-21 07:51:51</sys_updated_on> <u_additional_comment/> <u_approval>requested</u_approval> <u_date>2025-04-04</u_date> <u_end_time>2025-04-04 15:16:59</u_end_time> <u_number>PE0001157</u_number> <u_other/> <u_project_name display_value="ITC Edwards ITSM Project">b2f9853fc364a61052237405e40131c5</u_project_name> <u_project_work>-Now 1597 - did all testing . -Comeup with the approval date populating problem in the report for the Non TAT RITM requests. -To solve that , added set flow variable in the subflows which are tagged in the flow contex of the ritm. -Checked if the update sets which are taken backup from test which are not in the production.</u_project_work> <u_remarks/> <u_resourse display_value="Amal Madhav">5a8898a98381e650a946f896feaad37d</u_resourse> <u_start_time>2025-04-04 06:30:42</u_start_time> <u_work_hour>8.77</u_work_hour> <u_work_notes/> </u_project_effort> </record_update>
